snippet: In a statement Serena Williams said that she was still hopeful of playing in the Australian Open.
abstract: In a statement Serena Williams said that she was still hopeful of playing in the Australian Open.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams, a favorite to win the Australian Open, had a major setback in her second-round match at the Brisbane International on Wednesday, spraining her left ankle just points away from a straight sets victory over Bojana Jovanovski of Serbia.
